metadata.title: CVE-2024-35857 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  icmp: prevent possible NULL dereferences from icmp_build_probe()  First problem is a double call to __in_dev_get_rcu(), because the second one could return NULL.  if (__in_dev_get_rcu(dev) && __in_dev_get_rcu(dev)->ifa_list)  Second problem is a read from dev->ip6_ptr with no NULL check:  if (!list_empty(&rcu_dereference(dev->ip6_ptr)->addr_list))  Use the correct RCU API to fix these.  v2: add missing include <net/addrconf.h>
